UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

referralCode.description: Unique code for referral partners to share.

referredBy.description: The referral code of the partner who referred this user.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a single research or publishing project.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this project.

mobile.description: Contact mobile number for this specific project.

topic.description: The specific topic of the project.

courseLevel.description: The academic level of the course.

synopsisFileUrl.description: URL to the uploaded synopsis file.

referencingStyle.description: The required referencing style (e.g., APA, MLA).

wantToPublish.description: Indicates if the client wants to publish the work.

isPaperReady.description: Indicates if the client's paper is ready.

publishWhere.description: Specifies where the client wants to publish.

status.description: The current status of the project.

dealAmount.description: The final agreed amount for the project.

advanceReceived.description: The advance payment amount received from the client.

discussionNotes.description: Notes from the sales team's discussion with the client.

paymentScreenshotUrl.description: URL of the uploaded payment screenshot.

finalDeadline.description: The final completion deadline agreed upon.

finalizedAt.description: Timestamp when the deal was finalized.

finalizedBy.description: UID of the sales person who finalized the deal.

assignedSalesId.description: The UID of the sales person this lead is assigned to.

assignedWriterId.description: The UID of the writer assigned to this project.

rejectionReason.description: Reason why the project was rejected by the sales team.

referredByPartnerId.description: UID of the referral partner for leads converted without signup.

ContactLead.title: Contact Lead
ContactLead.description: A potential client lead, possibly submitted by a referral partner.

message.description: Notes from the person who submitted the lead.

referredByPartnerId.description: The UID of the referral partner who submitted this lead. Optional.

status.description: The lifecycle status of the lead.

assignedSalesId.description: The UID of the sales person this lead is assigned to.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: A task assigned to a writer or editor for a project.

projectId.description: The ID of the associated project.

assignedTo.description: The UID of the assigned writer/editor.

BookSale.title: Book Sale
BookSale.description: Represents a record of a book sale.

platform.description: The platform where the book was sold (e.g., Amazon, B&N).

Payout.title: Payout
Payout.description: Represents a payout to an author or partner.

userId.description: The UID of the user receiving the payout.

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Represents an invoice generated for a client.

pdfUrl.description: URL to the generated PDF invoice.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: A notification sent to a user.

Referral.title: Referral
Referral.description: Tracks a client referred by a partner.

partnerId.description: The UID of the referral partner.

referredUserId.description: The UID of the new client who was referred.

MarketingAsset.title: Marketing Asset
MarketingAsset.description: A file or asset for marketing purposes, available to partners.

title.description: The display name of the asset.

description.description: A brief description of the asset.

category.description: The category of the marketing asset.

fileName.description: The name of the uploaded file.

downloadUrl.description: The public URL to download the file from Firebase Storage.

fileType.description: The MIME type of the file.

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.description: Represents user feedback and ratings submitted from the website.

name.description: The name of the person giving feedback.

email.description: The email of the person giving feedback.

designation.description: The designation or role of the person (e.g., Professor, Student).

message.description: The content of the feedback message.

status.description: The moderation status of the feedback.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the feedback was submitted.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat session between two users.

participants.description: Array of UIDs of the participants in the chat.

participantNames.description: Map of participant UIDs to their names.

lastMessage.description: The content of the last message sent.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Top-level collection for all research projects, owned by users.

/contact_leads/{contactLeadId}.description: Collection for all contact leads, submitted from the main site or by partners.

/tasks/{taskId}.description: Collection for all project-related tasks assigned to team members.

/book_sales/{saleId}.description: Collection for tracking all book sales data.

/payouts/{payoutId}.description: Collection for managing payouts to authors and partners.

/invoices/{invoiceId}.description: Collection for all generated client invoices.

/referrals/{referralId}.description: Collection for tracking referrals made by partners.

/marketing_assets/{assetId}.description: Collection for storing marketing materials accessible by referral partners.

/feedbacks/{feedbackId}.description: Collection for storing user-submitted feedback and ratings for testimonials.

salesLeadIndex.description: The index of the last sales person who was assigned a lead.

/metadata/{docId}.description: Internal metadata for application logic, like round-robin counters.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Collection of chat sessions between users.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Sub-collection of messages within a specific chat.
